DOC.detailed_description: Women benign gynecology disease indicate laparoscopic hysterectomy ( laparoscopic subtotal hysterectomy : LSH , laparoscopic cervical ligament spar hysterectomy : CLSH , laparoscopic assist vaginal hysterectomy : LAVH ) invite explain detail protocol surgeon . The type hysterectomy determined patient surgeon together discussion . All participant sign inform consent . The participant follow two year surgery . The postoperative evaluation pelvic floor condition , questionaires etc also record different time point .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient indicated hysterectomy due benign gynecology disease . The participant 's husband also welcome join survey sexual life questionnaire necessary inclusion criterion . 1 .
